short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that saves and stores expiration dates for promotions received in your gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
➤ What it is
Never miss a deal again with ProFo (short for "Promotion FOMO"). This extension adds an easily accessible list of deals and promotions right on your chrome browser.

➤ How it works
Save promotions straight from your gmail inbox by simply opening the email, highlighting the expiration date, and clicking the green hat ProFo icon on your inbox toolbar thread. You can also manually add a promotion by simply clicking the "manually add promotion" button on the popup list. Deals that are soon to expire will be italicized and have an "!" in front of the list entry. Expired deals are automatically removed from the list, no need to manage it at all! Just click and never miss another great deal!

➤ Version 1.1.0 updates
- Manual entry functionality now available
- Program detects $ discounts now, and upgrade from previous version that only took in % discounts
- Multiple deals in email header are now taken into account
- Minor aesthetic changes to popup list
